description: Unit test file for Google Maps tools, testing various methods of the GoogleMapTools class including search, directions, address validation, geocoding, reverse geocoding, distance matrix, elevation, and timezone, with extensive mocking of external API responses.

classes.name: GoogleMapTools
classes.description: A class providing various Google Maps related functionalities such as search, directions, geocoding, and more.

methods.name: search_places
methods.description: Method to search for places using Google Maps API and return formatted results.

methods.name: get_directions
methods.description: Method to retrieve directions between two points.

methods.name: validate_address
methods.description: Method to validate an address using Google Maps API.

methods.name: geocode_address
methods.description: Method to geocode an address to latitude and longitude.

methods.name: reverse_geocode
methods.description: Method to reverse geocode coordinates to an address.

methods.name: get_distance_matrix
methods.description: Method to get distance and duration between origins and destinations.

methods.name: get_elevation
methods.description: Method to retrieve elevation data for given coordinates.

methods.name: get_timezone
methods.description: Method to get timezone information for given coordinates and time.
